answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds

answers.answer: Ape Framework is a feature-rich smart contract devtool and interaction library for Python developers. It has plugins to support the wide variety of ecosystems, service providers, and protocols in order to make Web3 development and operations as simple and easy as possible. It's primary benefit is to create the best possible Python developer experience for working with Crypto, managing the complexity and data aggregation required to create world-class Crypto applications.
answers.question: Provide a brief overview of your tool, library, or framework. What specific problem or inefficiency in the development process does it address?

answers.answer: Ape drastically simplifies the project development lifecycle through its simplified interface, and unlocks very simple Python service and application development to integrate Web3 ecosystems into the wider global economy. Ape is used as the foundation for a large variety of products and applications, such as our Silverback product and Remix's Vyper compiler integration, or as a support role for development of protocols such as Yearn, Curve, Lido, etc.
answers.question: How does your project reduce development barriers, improve efficiency, or enhance the security of Web3 projects? Please provide specific examples or metrics if available.

answers.answer:
Ape has almost 1k stars and consistently achieves 23k downloads a month, and has been growing in use since it's inception 4 years ago.

Ape is also well-loved by its small but growing community:
https://x.com/0xz80/status/1877758583397294577
https://x.com/centralizedmrc/status/1902794701826031969
https://x.com/lex_node/status/1899873197928931430
https://x.com/HipstermanVI/status/1898484078183411840
https://x.com/Rozengarden_eth/status/1897015160306590003
answers.question: Describe the current usage and support for your tool within the developer community. This could include GitHub stars, downloads, or testimonials from developers.

answers.answer: Ape is currently working towards its next v0.9 release, and our first significant refactor for v1 to support broader async support. The grant funds will help support our team, and associated costs required to develop the framework
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer: Ape is a devtool used by many projects to deploy contracts. We use it internally to deploy ApePay, which is our SaaS payments protocol we use for our latest product, Silverback
answers.question: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Ape Framework
project.description:
The most advanced smart contract framework on earth
Trusted by Yearn, Lido, Curve, and more

Ape is a smart contract development tool for Pythonistas, Data Scientists, and Security Professionals working on Ethereum and other EVM and non-EVM blockchain ecosystems
